section.name: Prerequisites
section.p: DESCRIBE: What needs to be installed before you can install this component (e.g. tomcat, any special jars in tomcat etc)

section.name: Related components
section.p: DESCRIBE: Any other AG components that you might need to install locally, or refer to when configuring this component (e.g. a Registry to register it in, a default FileStore etc).

section.name: Installation
section.p: DESCRIBE: How to install the component using:

ul.li: Manual installation (how to drop-in the WAR)
Command-line installation tool (if a command-line installer exists)
GUI installation tool (if a GUI installer exists)
